mapper.update:
update eis_resource_device
RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_TYPE = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUST = #{adjust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDITY_DATE = #{validityDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CYCLE = #{cycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABNORMAL_STATE = #{abnormalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUST_DATE = #{adjustDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENCLOSURE = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DEV_ID = #{devId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update eis_resource_device set RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_TYPE = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADJUST = #{adjust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALIDITY_DATE = #{validityDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CYCLE = #{cycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABNORMAL_STATE = #{abnormalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADJUST_DATE = #{adjustDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENCLOSURE = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DEV_ID = #{devId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
